rules_text:
Kicker {V}{V}{B} [i](You may pay an additional {V}{V}{B} as you cast this spell. Spend a different nonblack color of mana on each {V}.)[/i]
Mill three cards, then return up to one creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, you may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.
